an8.10:2.5: tena paraputtena visodhitena → kiṃ vo paraputto viheṭhiyati (bj); kiṃ paraputto viheṭheti (sya-all); kiṃ vo paraputtā viheṭheti (pts-vp-pli1ed); kiṃ so paraputto visodheti (mr)
an8.10:2.9: samaṇadūsīvāyaṃ → samaṇarūpī cāyaṃ (mr) | samaṇakāraṇḍavo’ti → samaṇakaraṇḍavoti (sya-all, mr)
an8.10:5.1: phuṇamānassa → pūyamānassa (bj); vuyhamānassa (si); phusayamānassa (sya-all); vuvahyamānassa (pts-vp-pli1ed); punamānassa (?) | apavahati → apakassati (bj)
